akn:section.akn:heading: Payor bankâ€™s responsibility for late return of item.

akn:content.akn:p: If an item is presented to and received by a payor bank, the bank is accountable for the amount of:

The liability of a payor bank to pay an item pursuant to subsection (a) of this section is subject to defenses based on breach of a presentment warranty (section 28:4-208) or proof that the person seeking enforcement of the liability presented or transferred the item for the purpose of defrauding the payor bank.
